awangad siduwima sambandhayen adahas dakwu senewirathna deyak janathawata pawasa sitimata pa්rathamayen eeta adala nithimaya karunu wimasa sitiya yuthuwa athayi pawasuweya.ranawaka ohuta haras kapuweya.awangad siduwima adhyanaya kale nithipathi departhamenthuwe usas niladharayaku bawath ayatha ganudenu wala yedi athayi awangad samagama ha sambandha pudgalayin athadanguwata ganune ohuge nirdesha yatathe bawath ranawaka pawasuweya.namuth pasuwa thawath niladharayek wenath mathayak idiripath kala bawath anathuruwa katayuthu siduwuye ee anuwa bawath ranawaka kiweya.hitapu amathya thilak marapana mahathada mema katayuthu ha sambandhawa siti bawa hethema wadidutath sandahan kaleya.
